92cc37f5-809c-452c-bd4a-1de9239e4a85.description: Earners of the noncredit Certificate in Corporate Aviation Management have gained a broad view on the corporate aviation function's impact on an organization's strategy, goals and profit. Blending general management best practices with practical considerations around aircraft acquisition, maintenance, equipment technology updates and changing regulations, this certificate program helps managers and leaders tackle conventional and emerging challenges to help their organizations evolve and grow.
92cc37f5-809c-452c-bd4a-1de9239e4a85.name: Darden Executive Education & Lifelong Learning Certificate in Corporate Aviation Management

Program costs: $7,450 - $9,950 per program.

ef3e898d-3f4b-42c4-8346-db48fc1e7b19.description: Earners of the Leading Change in Corporate Aviation Function program badge have gained insights to identify and understand the current change models in use, the sources for resistance to change and the phases of the change process. They can drive organizational change as well as manage the constant change within the corporate aviation function due to updated regulations, new corporate procedures, personnel turnover, etc.
ef3e898d-3f4b-42c4-8346-db48fc1e7b19.name: Darden Executive Education & Lifelong Learning Leading Change in the Corporate Aviation Function Program
